div.p: #d168excels CCSD 168 Families - As was reported today, Governor Pritzker has announced that schools will be closed through the end of the school year. We know this presents some challenges to our families but know this - your administrators, teachers and staff are ready for this challenge! Please watch our social media feeds and website in the days to come as we prepare for the remainder of the school year in a remote learning system. Your teachers will be sharing information with you as we finalize our planning for the remainder of the school year. Above all, please know we are here for you and will do whatever it takes to provide for our CCSD 168 families! District 168 strong! Dr. Donna S. Leak, Superintendent
